Summary: red ord cam toward my house, then stopped ascended and disappeared
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hollywood
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi went out on my back deck. i was just looking up at the sky. just as i was turning to walk back inside a red light caught my eye. i turned and stared at it, listening to hear if it was a plane, or helicopter, but there was no noise! i am not one who believes in ufo's, but i was freaked out. it came toward my house over the treetops, hovered for a bit, then it ascended straight up in the air, with no sound until it just disappeared! i do live near patuxant naval base, but have never seen anything like this, especially something red, that does not make a sound, then just poofed! just wondering if anyone else in maryland saw it 12\25\2012?
